metadata.title: CVE-2012-2666 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: golang/go in 1.0.2 fixes all.bash on shared machines. dotest() in src/pkg/debug/gosym/pclntab_test.go creates a temporary file with predicable name and executes it as shell script.

notes.note: mdeslaur> Packages built using golang need to be rebuilt once the vulnerability has been fixed. This CVE entry does not list packages that need rebuilding outside of the main repository or the Ubuntu variants with PPA overlays. sbeattie> fixed in 1.0.2

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.2').
